metadata.description: Letter to Secretary of National Defense and Communications Major General Basilio Valdes from Glicerio Quisumbing on the termination of two Tacloban-Palo telegraph lines and their reinstatement upon the arrival of batteries from the United States Army
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Leyte; official papers; letters; Secretary of National Defense and Communications
metadata.title: Letter to Secretary of National Defense and Communications Major General Basilio Valdes from Glicerio Quisumbing on the termination of two Tacloban-Palo telegraph lines
